title: Agents of Mayhem
notes: Game crashes right after start. No error message.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.14-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: With the latest proton version and drivers the game runs however I barely manage to get 5fps making the game completely unplayable. I tried the various Proton launch options to see if any of them made any difference but no dice.
